summary: A collection of utilities that integrate Litellm with cloud‑based secret stores (AWS KMS, AWS Secrets Manager, Google Cloud KMS, Google Secret Manager) and provide helpers for retrieving, decrypting, decoding, type‑casting and optionally caching configuration secrets from environment variables or external services.
business_intent: To ensure that Litellm can securely obtain API keys and other credentials without hard‑coding them, by leveraging managed secret services and a unified retrieval layer that abstracts provider details and supports safe handling of sensitive data.
